TextView.android:text: Note: Before performing power source switching over operation of PCU i.e. from Primary power source to Secondary power source, make sure all corresponding Fuse / MCBS are working normal
Measure earth resistance for all earth pits and record the values in Table 1 below
Brazing/ cleaning of all earthing strip joints
a) Switch OFF MCB catering to Primary Supply of PCU. Observe for relay change over sound
b) Switch ON MCB catering to Primary Supply of PCU and check the operation of PCU
Relay changes over and equipment operates normal (Nml)
Table 1: Earth Pit Resistance Measurements part of Half Yearly Maintenance
